com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupSlider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupSlider

  • public class ScupSlider
extends ScupWidgetBase
    This class represents a slider widget. This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the base widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

    • Field Detail

      • STYLE_HORIZONTAL

        public static final int STYLE_HORIZONTAL
        The horizontal slider style. The default state.
        Can set style when ScupSlider is created.
        See Also:
        ScupSlider(ScupDialog, int), Constant Field Values

      • STYLE_VERTICAL

        public static final int STYLE_VERTICAL
        Not supported yet! The vertical slider style. Can set style when ScupSlider is created.
        See Also:
        ScupSlider(ScupDialog, int), Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScupSlider

        public ScupSlider(ScupDialog dialog,
          int style)
        Creates a ScupSlider instance
        If you want to show this slider on the screen, call the ScupWidgetBase.show() function.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The parents dialog instance.
        style - The slider direction.
        STYLE_HORIZONTAL STYLE_VERTICAL
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If direction parameter is not STYLE_HORIZONTAL and STYLE_VERTICAL.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupSlider instance.
        If the Slider is shown on the screen, Slider will be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setMaxValue

        public void setMaxValue(int value)
        Sets the max value of slider. The slider end value.
        Parameters:
        value - The max value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If maxValue is less than or equal to minValue. Or if maxValue is less than current value.
        See Also:
        getMaxValue()

        Returns:
        value The max value
        See Also:
        setMaxValue(int)

      • setStep

        public void setStep(int step)
        Sets the slider step. The default is "1".
        Parameters:
        step - The slider moving step.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If step parameter is invalid.
        See Also:

        The slider step
        See Also:

      • setCurrentValue

        public void setCurrentValue(int value)
        Sets the current slider value.
        If the value is not multiple, the value is modified to multiple of step automatically.
        Parameters:
        value - The slider value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If value size is invalid.
        See Also:
        getCurrentValue()

      • getCurrentValue

        public int getCurrentValue()
        Gets the slider current value This value can be different with device side. It synchronizes it's data on specific time. (For example, the action button is clicked)
        Returns:
        The value
        See Also:
        setCurrentValue(int)

      • setBackgroundImage

        public void setBackgroundImage(Bitmap[] images)
        Set the slider background image. You can set the the start, middle, end of slider background.
        If the start, end image is null, the slider background is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by bitmap first item. And middle image is set by bitmap second item. end image is set by bitmap third item. If this image is not set, The default image will be shown.
        Parameters:
        images - The bitmap array. the maximum size is SLIDER_BG_MAX.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If images is null or images size is invalid.
        See Also:
        setBackgroundImage(int[])

      • setBackgroundImage

        public void setBackgroundImage(int[] resIds)
        Set the slider background image. You can set the the start, middle, end of slider background.
        If the start, end image is null, the slider background is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by resId first item. And middle image is set by resId second item. end image is set by resId third item. If this image is not set, The default image will be shown.
        Parameters:
        resIds - The bitmap resource id array. the maximum size is SLIDER_BG_MAX.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resIds size is invalid or each resource id is invalid.
        See Also:
        setBackgroundImage(Bitmap[])

      • setSliderImage

        public void setSliderImage(Bitmap[] images)
        Set the slider image. You can set the the start, middle, end of slider.
        If the start, end image is null, the slider is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by bitmap first item. And middle image is set by bitmap second item. end image is set by bitmap third item.
        The end image is not applied. because The end image hide behind thumb image. The end image will be used right to left slider. but the right to left slider is not supported yet. If this image is not set, The default image will be shown.
        Parameters:
        images - The bitmap array. the maximum size is SLIDER_BG_MAX.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If images is null or bitmaps size is invalid.
        See Also:
        setSliderImage(int[])

      • setSliderImage

        public void setSliderImage(int[] resIds)
        Set the slider image. You can set the the start, middle, end of slider.
        If the start, end image is null, the slider is drawn using only middle image.
        start image is set by resId first item. And middle image is set by resId second item. end image is set by resId third item.
        The end image is not applied. because The end image hide behind thumb image. The end image will be used right to left slider. but the right to left slider is not supported yet.
        If this image is not set, The default image will be shown.
        Parameters:
        resIds - The bitmap resource id array. the maximum size is SLIDER_BG_MAX.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resIds size is invalid or each resource id is invalid.
        See Also:
        setSliderImage(Bitmap[])

      • setThumbImage

        public void setThumbImage(Bitmap images)
        Set the slider thumb image.
        Parameters:
        images - The slider thumb image.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If images is null.
        See Also:
        setThumbImage(int)

      • setThumbImage

        public void setThumbImage(int resId)
        Sets the slider thumb image.
        Parameters:
        resId - The image resource id.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If resId is invalid.
        See Also:
        setThumbImage(Bitmap)

              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets the padding.
        Parameters:
        left - the left padding in point units
        top - the top padding in point units
        right - the right padding in point units
        bottom - the bottom padding in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.
